Package pgrid.util

Interface Summary
TimerListener This listener is called by the TimerManager when a timer hits his timeout
 

Class Summary
BoundedHashtable The Bounded Hashtable is a FIFO queue bounded to a given amount of elements.
BoundedVector The Bounded Vector is a FIFO queue bounded to a given amount of elements.
Cloner This class makes deep hard copy of any Serializable object and all of its Serializable member objects.
Compression This class compresses and decompresses data using the Java Deflater and Inflater.
Constants This class represents global constants.
Converter This class converts bytes to binary strings, to hexadecimal strings, and hexadecimal strings to bytes.
LexicalDefaultHandler Class description goes here
PathComparator This class implement Comparator and compare two path or two hosts.
Properties This class represents the application properties.
Reflector This class provides functions to create objects on runtime and invoke its methods on runtime.
SecurityHelper This pgrid.helper class take care of encryption.
TimerManager This class is a timer manager.
Tokenizer This Tokenizer uses the Java StringTokenizer to tokenize given strings by a given separator.
Utils This class causes periodic Exchanges.
WorkerThread Abstract class providing basic framework for long-running tasks.
XMLTools This class provides useful tools for XML strings.
